short_summary: Thirty (30) Android Scanners and accessories for Library and Archives Canada
description: Superseding the previous solicitation number WS3617150078 with a closing of December 23, 2022.  \\nAMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and Buyandsell posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by March 20, 2023 at 14:00 EST. All bids submitted after 14:00 EST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.  \\nThis solicitation is for the requirement of thirty (30) Android Scanners and accessories to be delivered to Ottawa, Ontario.
